mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM ( IDX,ITEMNAME,ITEMCONTENT,ITEMLEVEL,SALE,ITEMPRICE,ITEMCOUNT,ITEMCATEGORY,URL,ISDEL ) VALUES ( member_seq.nextval , ${itemName} , ${itemContent} , ${itemLevel} , ${sale} , ${itemPrice} , ${itemCount} , ${itemCategory} , ${url} , ) ITEMNAME, ITEMCONTENT, ITEMLEVEL, SALE,ITEMPRICE, ITEMCOUNT, ITEMCATEGORY, URL ,ISDEL
mapper.select: select * from item order by idx
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM set ITEMNAME = '#{itemName}', ITEMCONTENT = '#{itemContent}', ITEMLEVEL = '#{itemLevel}', SALE = '#{sale}', ITEMPRICE = '#{itemPrice}', ITEMCOUNT = '#{itemCount}', ITEMCATEGORY = '#{itemCategory}', URL = '#{url}' WHERE idx= #{idx}
